thread.title: N.H. Missing Woman Case Linked To 4 Bodies Found In Park And California Murder
thread.title_full: N.H. Missing Woman Case Linked To 4 Bodies Found In Park And California Murder

author: miketoole
title: N.H. Missing Woman Case Linked To 4 Bodies Found In Park And California Murder
text:
CONCORD, N.H. (AP) — Authorities are providing new information about the connection between a young New Hampshire woman’s disappearance 35 years ago , four bodies that were later found in a state park and a California murder case.
Investigators released new forensic images of the victims, Nov. 17, 2015. (Image credit: N.H. Attorney General)
Two of the bodies — a woman and a girl — were found in 1985, and the bodies of two more girls were found in 2000. They’ve never been identified , but authorities believe they were killed between 1980 and 1984.
Two bodies were found in this metal drum near Bear Brook State Park in 2000. (WBZ-TV file image)
In 1981, 23-year-old Denise Beaudin disappeared, along with her boyfriend and infant daughter. Her family thought they had moved away due to financial trouble, but investigators recently opened a criminal investigation based on new information.
A Manchester, N.H., home where police say Denise Beaudin lived. (WBZ-TV)
The New Hampshire attorney general’s office is holding a news conference Thursday about the New Hampshire cases and a California case.
